categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic droids

nodes.text: Y6-T0 was an astromech droid who served in the Alliance to Restore the Republic during the Galactic Civil War. The droid was stationed aboard a rebel flight school and during General Hera Syndulla's training of a pilot, Syndulla took remote control of the X-wing starfighter X-332 via Y6-T0.
